messages.content: Nicola Sturgeon wants to hold another independence referendum next year, and Jeremy Corbyn has said his Labour Party won’t even stand in the way of one taking place. So this election could be our last chance to stop that referendum, but to do that we all need to send Nicola Sturgeon and the SNP a message they can’t ignore.

mentions.tacticalSituation: LABOUR AND THE LIB DEMS ARE JUST TOO WEAK TO BEAT THE SNP HERE

quotes.text: CORBYN ACCUSED OF PLOT TO BREAK UP BRITAIN
... the Labour leader admitted he could grant a referendum if he was to win the General Election.
Corbyn could back new indyref ‘as early as 2021’

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes the threat of an independence referendum and positions the candidate as a unionist alternative aiming to prevent this. It also claims that Labour and Liberal Democrats are too weak to beat the SNP in the Dundee East constituency.
